title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Candidate and Release date columns to GHES releases table.
Enabled usage-based billing for non-bundled GitHub Enterprise licenses in Visual Studio bundles.
Introduced GitHub-owned blob storage (GHOS) for migrations with CLI flag `--use-github-storage`.
summary:
- Added Candidate and Release date columns to GHES releases table.
- Enabled usage-based billing for non-bundled GitHub Enterprise licenses in Visual Studio bundles.
- Introduced GitHub-owned blob storage (GHOS) for migrations with CLI flag `--use-github-storage`.
generated_title: Usage-based billing for VS bundles, GHES release dates, and GitHub-owned migration storage
commits: **5040691**: VS bundles support usage-based GHE licenses (#57086) (by Isaac Brown)
**f1356d1**: Add separate Candidate and Release date columns to GHES releases table (#57149) (by Kevin Heis)
**ef7d0f4**: Update migration docs to include guidance for using GitHub owned blob storage (#57122) (by Jim Boyle)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Candidate and Release date columns to GHES releases table.
- Enabled usage-based billing for non-bundled GitHub Enterprise licenses in Visual Studio bundles.
- Introduced GitHub-owned blob storage (GHOS) for migrations with CLI flag `--use-github-storage`.

### Title
Usage-based billing for VS bundles, GHES release dates, and GitHub-owned migration storage
